translation.en: [radio announcer] From Independence Mall, this is news radio, KYW Philadelphia ten--
translation.ko: 인디펜던스 몰에서 전해 드리는 KYW 필라델피아 라디오 뉴스...

translation.en: [female reporter] Absolute chaotic scene behind me right now at this intersection,
translation.ko: 앞서 오늘 저녁에 발생한 사고로 인해 이곳 교차로는 그야말로 혼란의 도가니입니다

translation.en: a bus driver collided with several oncoming vehicles,
translation.ko: "채널 2 현장 특보" 버스가 레미콘을 포함한 다수의 차량과 추돌해

translation.en: -one of them a cement mixer. -[grunting] All right, here we go.
A huge mess on the scene here right now.
We're still not clear as to what exactly happened here,
translation.ko: 정확한 사고 원인은 아직 밝혀지지 않은 상태지만

translation.en: whether the driver passed out while operating the vehicle
translation.ko: 버스 기사가 운전 중 의식을 잃었거나

translation.en: or simply died at the wheel.
We don't have a cause of death at this point,
translation.ko: 버스 기사의 사인은 밝혀진 바 없으며

translation.en: but some of our medical experts are talking about the fact
that it could've been a heart attack -or a stroke. -Mmm, perfect pancake!
translation.ko: 심장마비 또는 심근경색에 무게를 두고 있습니다

translation.en: We don't have a name on the driver, no information at all. Police have not released that at this point.
translation.ko: 기사의 신상 정보는 경찰이 아직 보도하지 않고 있으나

translation.en: -Next of kin still being notified. -[cell phone rings]
But no other casualties reported, -which is a minor miracle. -Fuck. [groans]
translation.ko: 기적 같게도 기사를 제외하곤 어떤 사상자도 없습니다

translation.en: Speaking with some of the officers here on the scene...
translation.ko: 현장의 경찰관들과 대화를 나눠 본 결과...

translation.en: is what these officers are saying to me. Uh, we...
translation.ko: 더 많은 사상자가 발생할 수 있었으나...

translation.en: Was that Maddox? Yeah. I gotta go soon.
translation.ko: - 매독스 전화야? - 응, 곧 나가야 해

translation.en: [grunts] How's my baby girl? Kicking up a storm.
translation.ko: - 우리 딸은 좀 어때? - 엄청 차대

translation.en: Feels like she got your big feet.
Maybe I'll pick up some Doc Martens on the way out.
Had that weird pregnancy dream again. [Tommy] Oh, no.
We were still on the beach, but a little different this time.
translation.ko: 또 그 해변이었는데 이번엔 좀 달랐어

translation.en: I couldn't see you, but I knew you were with me,
translation.ko: 자기가 안 보였지만 같이 있는 건 알았어

translation.en: like how sometimes you just know things like that in a dream.
translation.ko: 자기가 안 보였지만 같이 있는 건 알았어 왜 꿈에서 그냥 그렇게 느껴지는 거 있잖아

translation.en: Honey, you seen my other shoe?
translation.ko: 여보, 내 신발 한 짝 봤어?

translation.en: Your shoes are under the bed.
So we were standing in the shallow water,
and we were playing that game like you play as a kid.
translation.ko: 우린 얕은 바닷가에 서서 어릴 때 하던 놀이를 하고 있었어

translation.en: When the tide would go back out you'd twist a little and...
translation.ko: 파도가 치고 빠질 때마다 발을 조금씩 비틀어서

translation.en: [stammers] and sink lower into the wet sand.
translation.ko: 모래에 더 깊이 파묻히게 하는 놀이

translation.en: I just kept sinking down and down,
translation.ko: 그런데 내가 갈수록 깊이 빠져들어 가서

translation.en: and no matter how hard I tried, I couldn't get up.
translation.ko: 아무리 용을 써도 빠져나올 수 없게 됐어

translation.en: I love you, Tommy Lockhart. I love you more.
translation.ko: - 사랑해, 토미 록하트 - 내가 더 사랑해

translation.en: But these graveyard shifts are the worst.
translation.ko: 근데 당신 야근하는 건 정말 싫어

translation.en: I'm tired of having breakfast for dinner.
But I'll bring you something back to make up for it.
-I look forward to being proven wrong. -Deal.
[sportscaster] With the shot clock winding down, Barkley coming up short once again.
translation.ko: 시간이 계속 흐르는 가운데 바클리가 부진을 면치 못합니다

translation.en: Another good night of rebounding for Charles, but not enough buckets.
translation.ko: 찰스가 리바운드를 다수 기록하며 분발하고 있지만...

translation.en: -Hey, come on, I wanna see how it ends. -[exhales]
Huh, Winston Maddox, you got some amount of money riding on this tonight?
[sportscaster] And that's all she wrote, folks.
Philadelphia loses a heartbreaker to Atlanta, 103 to 101.
[Maddox] Thought most folks think about moving out of white trash neighborhoods.
translation.ko: 보통은 그런 동네에서 이사 나가려고 하지 않냐?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Trust me, I'm working on it.
You know, the first perp that ever took a swing at me was two blocks that way.
translation.ko: 나한테 처음으로 덤빈 놈 집이 저쪽으로 두 블록 가면 있어

translation.en: Oh, yeah. You never mentioned it.
Yeah, you're all jokes now, but you've got a pregnant wife back there, pal.
Back pain, feet the size of a kitchen sink.
translation.ko: 등은 아프지, 발은 부어서 싱크대만 하지

translation.en: She's cranky, she's hungry... Yeah, I remember those days.
But hey, maybe you can find the guy that knocked her up
translation.ko: 임신시킨 놈 찾으면 그놈보고 감당하라고 해

translation.en: -and make him deal with it. -[laughing] Fuck you.
translation.ko: 임신시킨 놈 찾으면 그놈보고 감당하라고 해 좆 까

translation.en: All right, what do we got?
We've got a big pile-up downtown.
That's bridge traffic. That's gonna be, I don't know, 30 minutes?
Ten spot says I'll get us there in 20.
Oh, 22 minutes. You owe me ten.
You know, when he, uh, dry cleans his ties, it's full starch.
-Hey, that's my wife's brother. -Tell me he's not a dick.
translation.ko: - 내 처형이야, 인마 - 내가 틀린 말했냐?

translation.en: -Maintain a safe distance at all times. -Keep it clear over there!
translation.ko: - 안전거리 잘 유지해 - 거기 정리 좀 해

translation.en: This whole thing is nuts. You should've seen the bus driver.
translation.ko: 어수선해 죽겠다 버스 기사를 네가 봤으면 엄청 좋아했을 텐데
버스 기사를 네가 봤으면 엄청 좋아했을 텐데 - 어째서? - 특이한 케이스거든

translation.en: Oh, trust me, she's a doozy.
-Don't do it. You know how Holt gets. -I'll just take a peek.
translation.ko: 홀트 형사 성격 알면서 그럴래? 살짝만 보고 올게

translation.en: Is a normal, boring shift too much to ask?
Oh, God, do you smell that?
then hit hard on the steering wheel.
Who invited you two to the party?
Officers, I'm gonna need you to dust all this broken glass for fingerprints.
translation.ko: 유리 조각 전부 모아서 지문이나 채취해

translation.en: I'm just fucking with you. [Tommy scoffs] Yeah.
So how's my sis? She about to explode?
translation.ko: 내 동생은 좀 어때? 곧 터질 것 같나?

translation.en: Yeah, any day. Uh, you know, these are--
Yep, we solved that one, Crockett.
Boys across town just caught two more bodies.
translation.ko: 다른 구역의 경관들이 시신 두 구를 더 찾았어요

translation.en: They said both had some kind of mark on their neck.
Pump your brakes, all right? You've had your five minutes.
We're gonna stay here. We'll relax.
Plenty of people can stand behind tape, yell at reporters. Come on.
translation.ko: 현장에서 기자들 상대할 경관들은 차고 넘쳐

translation.en: Hey, just trying to learn from the best, Detective.
-Go ahead. -Well, there was just blood everywhere.
But no brains on this one.
Oh! There we go. Ah, Jesus!
No kind of hemorrhage I know of includes brain disintegration.
translation.ko: 출혈로 뇌수가 흘러나오는 경우는 못 들어 봤어요

translation.en: It could be a drug thing, you know, puncture wounds.
translation.ko: 상처로 보건대 약물이 관련됐을 수 있어요

translation.en: -What we need to do is run toxicology. -What do you mean, "we"?
translation.ko: 우린 독성 검사를 해 봐야 해요 '우리'라니?

translation.en: Look, you were right about the bus driver, good call,
translation.ko: 버스 기사 건은 정말 잘해 줬어

translation.en: but I'm running point on this. You do your job, I'll do mine.
translation.ko: 근데 수사 지휘자는 나니까 자네 일에나 집중해

translation.en: -Come on, give me a bone here. -[man] Detective! Detective Holt!
Look, look, look, I respect the hustle, I do, -but... -Detective!
Look, even though nobody said the word "serial killer" out loud yet,
that time's coming, and when it does...
translation.ko: 그러는 건 시간 문제고 그렇게 되면 이건...

translation.en: this is my first big one, okay.
I need to be able to wrap my head around it on my own.
Just give me a little breathing room, all right?
translation.ko: 그러니까 나 숨 좀 쉬게 해 줘

translation.en: Detective, what can you tell us about the other two victims?
translation.ko: 피해자 두 명에 대해서 해 주실 말씀은 없나요?

translation.en: [Holt] Sorry, everybody, no official statement yet.
translation.ko: 공식적으로 밝힐 수 있는 건 아직 없습니다

translation.en: You know the drill, we're still collecting evidence.
translation.ko: 공식적으로 밝힐 수 있는 건 아직 없습니다 현재 증거 수집 중입니다

translation.en: [man] Is there a connection to the other deaths?
-What'd I tell you? He's a dick. -I can't answer that question,
and even if I could, I wouldn't do it right here, okay?
translation.ko: 제가 말씀드릴 수 있는 건 여기까지입니다

translation.en: Eh, you're just making more work for yourself,
and more importantly, more work for me.
translation.ko: 그리고 네가 그러면 나도 일을 해야 하고

translation.en: You don't want to see where this goes? Huh?
translation.ko: 넌 어떻게 된 건지 궁금하지도 않냐?

translation.en: Shit. I wanna go kick bums out of the park like we're supposed to.
translation.ko: 그냥 평소대로 공원에서 노숙자들이나 쫓아내고 싶어

translation.en: Yeah, well, bums will still be there when we're done, bud.
Yeah, three bodies came in tonight, all of them had brain hemorrhaging,
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 뇌출혈로 들어온 시신 세 구가 있는데요

translation.en: marks in the back of their neck.
Oh, I'm, uh, Officer Lockhart. This is Officer Maddox.
translation.ko: 전 로크 경관이고 여긴 매독스 경관입니다

translation.en: Okay. Well, there's been a hold placed on that report
translation.ko: 그 시신들에 관한 보고는 보류 중이에요

translation.en: -Yeah, he's family, sir. I'm sure-- -I said a hold, Officer.
Can't break protocol every time some idiot's stuck with a needle.
translation.ko: 고작 바늘 자국 때문에 절차를 깰 순 없어요

translation.en: So it was a puncture wound.
And deep enough to impact the vertebrate.
So, some kind of poison, like blowfish toxin?
translation.ko: 독극물을 주입한 건가요? - 복어독 같은 걸? - 아뇨

translation.en: Lab techs all have hard-ons for it.
Because we have no idea what it is.
No one's ever seen it before.
I've got other dead people waitin'.
[snaps fingers] All right, we need to think.
You know, I think you're supposed to say "Asian" now.
Whatever, as long as they keep that sweet and sour pork coming,
I'll call 'em whatever they want. Shit.
Listen, all I'm saying is we got people getting injected
translation.ko: 웬 놈이 동위원소인지 뭔지를 사람들한테 쑤셔 넣고 다니는데

translation.en: with a fucking isotope of all things, and nobody can tell us shit.
translation.ko: 웬 놈이 동위원소인지 뭔지를 사람들한테 쑤셔 넣고 다니는데 정보를 주는 사람이 아무도 없어

translation.en: And the times of death are minutes apart, the bodies are miles apart...
translation.ko: 사망 시각은 몇 분 차이인데 위치는 한참 떨어져 있고

translation.en: I'll take "crazy shit happens" for 200, Alex.
translation.ko: 그냥 미친 우연의 일치에 2백 달러 건다

translation.en: We had three random victims with the brains melted out of their faces.
translation.ko: 서로 아무 관련 없는 셋이 전부 뇌가 녹아서 죽었는데

translation.en: I'll admit, it's weird, but... shit.
Remember them two yuppies washed up on the shore of the lake couple years ago?
translation.ko: 2년 전에 젊은 놈 둘이 해변에서 시체로 발견됐어

translation.en: Buck naked, bruised up. Everybody thought it was a mob hit.
translation.ko: 알몸에 온몸이 멍투성이로 다들 마피아 짓인 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Turns out it was just two gays, liked it rough,
translation.ko: 알고 보니 그저 게이 둘이 좀 격렬하게 즐기다가

translation.en: having a bit too much to drink before they went skinny dipping.
translation.ko: 거나하게 취한 채로 물에 들어갔다가 익사한 거였지

translation.en: But you heard what the coroner said, right?
translation.ko: 근데 너도 검시관이 말한 거 들었잖아

translation.en: Man, your energy's all over the place, man.
Let the game come to you.
You won't have time to think about shit this much. It'll be...
translation.ko: 이런 거 생각할 여유 따위 없을걸

translation.en: It's not my fault you've got a gambling problem. Give me the money.
translation.ko: 그러니까 누가 내기하래? 어서 돈이나 내놔

translation.en: Hey, I'll strike you a deal here.
Uh, give me that... that for ten?
Gonna make a girl happy. Appreciate it.
Oh, come on, I was gonna eat that.
You're kidding me. Put it on my tab.
translation.ko: - 망할 자식 - 내 앞으로 걸어 둬

translation.en: [police radio] Units be advised 314 at Hydra on 22nd and Armory,
translation.ko: 전 대원에게 전달 22번가와 아머리 사이 하이드라에서 314 상황

translation.en: female, late teens, assaulted, blunt force to the neck.
translation.ko: 피해자는 10대 후반 여성 목을 둔기로 가격

translation.en: Could you get the officer at Hydra and get me on the radio?
translation.ko: 하이드라에 있는 경관과 연결해 줄 수 있는지?

translation.en: -[Palmer] Go for it, Officer Palmer. -Evening. Officer Lockhart here.
translation.ko: 여긴 파머 경관, 송신 수고, 여긴 로크 경관

translation.en: You mind looking at the back of your victim's neck?
translation.ko: 피해자 목 뒤를 살펴봐 줄 수 있는지?

translation.en: What about the blood? Anything weird?

translation.ko: 무슨 출혈 말하는지? 피해자 살아 있음

translation.en: -All right, we're on our way. -[engine turns over]
Girl says she was stabbed with some kind of metal tool or some shit.
translation.ko: 그 여자가 말하길 무슨 공구 같은 걸로 찔린 것 같대

translation.en: Last week we had a guy come in from this place,
translation.ko: 저번 주에 여기서 한 놈이 끌려왔는데

translation.en: egg beater stuck up his ass, I shit you not.
I was too impressed to be disgusted.
All right, tell me what happened.
She had on a blue hoodie.
Like she was in the wrong neighborhood.
Her hand was all messed up. It was covered in dried blood.
translation.ko: 손이 엉망이었고 피가 잔뜩 말라붙어 있었어요

translation.en: Okay, it's okay. Which hand? Right here.

translation.ko: - 왼손이요 - 왼손, 좋아요 - 잘하고 있어요 - 토미

translation.en: Tom, I just got off with the coroner. What the hell?
translation.ko: - 잘하고 있어요 - 토미 검시관과 얘기했어 무슨 짓이야?

translation.en: Yeah, I was just about to get you on the radio.
Listen, she's got that shit in her bloodstream. We need to--
Don't even listen to him. It's fine.

translation.ko: 어떻게 된 건지 처음부터 말해 보세요

translation.en: Come on, I just told him everything.
He's a little deaf. I want you to tell me.
translation.ko: 저 친구가 귀가 안 좋아서 저한테 얘기해 보세요

translation.en: and out of nowhere, this crazy chick tackles me to the ground.
translation.ko: 웬 미친 계집이 절 바닥에 넘어뜨렸어요

translation.en: These guys, they... they pulled her off me, but...
she... she poked my neck with something.
Jesus. Hey, hey, hey! I need some help here!
We need an EMT now! Hey! Now, now, now!
Get a medic up here! Get a medic up here! Hey, hey, hey!
[officer on radio] Stand by for a single live BOLO.
last seen at Hydra on Arch Street.
Five foot six, twenties, dried blood on her left hand,
Put your hands on your head!
suspect last seen on foot at Chestnut and University.
This is our chance at detective.
Don't tell me you're not thinking about it.
I'm thinking I got the wrong skin tone for that.
translation.ko: 형사 하기엔 내 피부색이 잘못된 것 같은데

translation.en: But you got that sparkling personality.
Get out of the way. [Tommy] Move along, people.
You about to draw down on Old Saint Nick. You almost killed Christmas.
I repeat, suspect heading west across Liberty!
translation.ko: 반복한다 용의자 리버티가에서 서쪽으로 도주 중

translation.en: If you've got a badge on your chest and a gun on your hip, I want you at that position now.
translation.ko: 경관들은 한 명도 빠짐없이 전원 해당 위치로 이동 바람

translation.en: Police! Move! Go! Get out of the way!
Out of the way! Go! Move!
-[Maddox] Lock, she went this way! -[man] Hey!
I got this! I got this! Go around! Go around!
translation.ko: 내가 이쪽으로 갈게 넌 돌아서 가!

translation.en: I gotta cut back to a pack a day.
Meet me at Girard subway station.
[Maddox] What the fuck are you talking about?
No one in and no one out!
Philly PD, get the fuck out of here!
[man over radio] Officer Lockhart, I've got Rosewood General on the line.
translation.ko: 로크 경관, 로즈우드 병원에서 연락이 왔는데

translation.en: You two, stay on this level.
Why don't you come on out?
Got the wind knocked out of me.
Fuck! I think she broke my leg.
I need an ambulance at the Girard Street subway.
Stay right there. Stay right fucking there!
Get on the ground. Hey, hey!
You fucking deaf? I said get on the ground.
I said get on the ground!
[officer] Whoa, pal! Hey, what are you still doing here?
Yes, sir. Uh, where's the maternity ward?
Uh, next building, down the hallway, elevator to the third floor.
I know it's not the best time, but I need to check a few boxes while it's still fresh.
translation.ko: 때가 안 좋은 건 알지만 확인할 게 있어서 말이야

translation.en: Okay, so far, she's a nobody,
no ID, no fingerprint matches, nothing.
translation.ko: 신분증도 없고 지문도 조회가 안 돼

translation.en: All she had on her were these keys. We have no idea what they go to.
translation.ko: 소지품은 이 열쇠들뿐이고 어디에 쓰는지는 몰라

translation.en: We're drawing a blank. Mean anything to you?
translation.ko: 알아낸 게 없어 이 열쇠 알아보겠나?

translation.en: -Lockhart. Just give me one moment. -You didn't fire your weapon at all?
They pulled a bullet from our girl's wrist...
and it matches a service revolver.
-What are you talking about? -No one else reported a shot fired.
translation.ko: - 무슨 소리예요? - 근데 총격 보고는 없었지

translation.en: We can't make heads or tails.
what happened down there, son, in the subway station?
translation.ko: 역에서 무슨 일이 있었는지 얘기해 줄 수 있겠나?

translation.en: Yes, yes. Hi, I'm... I'm Tom... Tom Lockhart.
[faintly] But so far, the baby appears to be safe.
I'm right here. I'm right here, baby.
-It's okay. Look, I got you something. -[groaning and panting]
I got you something good. Yeah, I got you a bracelet.
translation.ko: 자기 주려고 산 팔찌야 잘될 테니까 걱정 마

translation.en: We're gonna push right through this. We're gonna push right through this.

translation.ko: 그쪽 애들이 약물 과용으로 결론 짓고 덮어 버려서 몰랐죠

translation.en: Had a fringe militia club. The Real American Movement.
translation.ko: 민병대를 조직해서 '진정한 미국 찾기 운동'을 주도했어요

translation.en: Wanted to take the country back for the true patriots.
You know, homemade fertilizer bombs. You know the type.
translation.ko: 사제 폭탄을 만들고 그런 놈들 있잖아요

translation.en: And I got his mailing list.
Two of the four victims from '97 were on it.
translation.ko: 97년도 피해자 넷 중 둘이 목록에 있어요

translation.en: All of 'em from '88, that's the connection.
They're all part of this radical movement.
And I'm thinking that isotope that she injects them with
translation.ko: 그 여자가 피해자들에게 주입한 그 물질은

translation.en: is some high-tech way of killing people remotely.
translation.ko: 원격으로 사람을 죽일 수 있는 기능이 있는 것 같아요

translation.en: And it's triggered from the future, maybe. I...
I don't know. I don't... I don't entirely have that pinned down yet.
and his theory about the lunar cycle bridge thing?
Had to do with the moon.
She gets torn apart by a train and nine years later she's back,
translation.ko: 열차에 치어 찢겨 죽은 여자가 9년 뒤에 살아 돌아와 사람들을 죽이고 다녔다고요
9년 뒤에 살아 돌아와 사람들을 죽이고 다녔다고요

translation.en: she didn't come back to life.
Okay? You sound like a fuckin' insane person right now. You need help.
translation.ko: 지금 하는 얘기 들어 보면 완전 미친 사람 같아

translation.en: She knew things about me, Holt.
She knew things about Jeanie, and Amy.
Have you completely lost your fuckin' mind?
You're talking about a case... that's been cold for a fuckin' decade.
translation.ko: 자네가 말하는 그 사건은 10년 가까이 미결 상태야

translation.en: You know how many murders I've had in the past week?
translation.ko: 지난주에만 살인 사건이 몇 건이었는지 알아?

translation.en: I'm raising your own daughter, for Christ sake,
translation.ko: 나한테 자기 친딸 키우는 것도 맡겨 놓고

translation.en: and you're coming to me with fucking time travel?
translation.ko: 와서 한다는 소리가 시간 여행 나부랭이야?

translation.en: Are you even listening to yourself?
translation.ko: 지금 본인이 뭔 얘길 하는지 알고 있긴 해?

translation.en: I couldn't stop what happened to Jeanie.
All I want is her address.
And I won't ask you for nothing ever again.
translation.ko: 이후로 다신 부탁 같은 거 하지 않을게요

translation.en: You're chasing moonbeams while your own life got away.
translation.ko: 자네가 달빛을 쫓아다니는 동안 자네 인생은 허공으로 흩어졌어

translation.en: It's just fucking sad to watch.
It's sad that Amy has to watch it.
Maybe I... maybe I need help.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 정말 병원에 가 봐야 할지도 모르죠

translation.en: I'm sorry for all the shit, man.
And I'm sorry for you taking care of Amy and, uh...
if you're serious about getting out, I got your back.
I'm gonna give the department shrink a call.
See if she can make a recommendation.
No, I'm a dick and I know it.
translation.ko: 아냐, 내가 봐도 난 나쁜 새끼야

translation.en: That's what we do, right? We take care of each other.
Yes, hi, this is, uh, Captain Holt.
I just need a last known address for a Heather Russell.
translation.ko: 헤더 러셀의 주소 좀 조회해 주겠나?

translation.en: [man on TV] Save up to 80 percent by buying factory direct.
...a direct diamond importer and manufactures factory direct.
translation.ko: 수입부터 제조, 유통까지 모두 직거래로 이뤄집니다

translation.en: The Jewelry Factory has thousands of diamonds and setting mounds
Ms. Russell, mind if I come in?
Get out of the car. Get out. Get out!
I shot her in the hand!
This is when she gets shot. I'm the one who did it. It already happened!
translation.ko: 이때 손을 다친 거예요 저 때문에요!

translation.en: But we've gotta wait nine more years, Holt.
But listen, if we kill her, we can stop it all from happening.
translation.ko: 녀석을 죽이면 전부 되돌릴 수 있어요

translation.en: I could be there for Jeanie, Holt.
We can stop it all from happening, Holt!
Listen to me! Hey, listen to me!
attempting termination of marks one through three.
I have brain dissolution on mark one.
And on marks two and three.
I think we may have a winner.
With the pairing of the coronal isotopes,
we could eventually be triggering this solution from a future point in time.
translation.ko: 나중엔 이걸 미래에서 활성화할 수도 있겠어

translation.en: It's, um... been a while, so...
George and I have been talking it over and...
I'd like you to be here for it.
I think it's what Mom would have wanted, and...
I think it's what I want too, so...
I know... I know it's that time of year again,
translation.ko: 지금이 그 시기인 건 알고 있어요

translation.en: and I know things between us have been...
translation.ko: 지금이 그 시기인 건 알고 있어요 그리고 저랑 아빠 사이도...

translation.en: But I'd still love it if you could make it.
translation.ko: 그래도 와 주시면 정말 좋을 것 같아요

translation.en: Either way, please... call me back.
translation.ko: 못 오시게 돼도 꼭 전화 주세요

translation.en: [Naveen] I knew you'd be back, Mr. Lockhart.
I really am sorry about all this.
You're a hard man to find, Rao. You disappeared on me.
translation.ko: 라오 박사, 그렇게 찾을 땐 안 보이더니...

translation.en: Of all people, you should understand an obsession with work.
translation.ko: 당신이라면 일에 대한 집착을 이해하실 줄 알았는데요

translation.en: Yeah, speaking of work, you can just let me out right here.
translation.ko: 말이 나와서 말인데 여기서 당장 내려 줘

translation.en: I'm afraid I cannot do that.
If you don't, she keeps killing.
translation.ko: 안 그럼 그 여자가 계속 사람을 죽일 거야

translation.en: Changing the world is a bloody business, Thomas.
translation.ko: 세상을 바꾸려면 피를 봐야 하는 법이죠

translation.en: I think we're both a little beyond the pale, really.
translation.ko: 그건 우리 둘 모두에게 해당하는 말인 것 같군요

translation.en: I'll be keeping you in a safe place for the next few days.
translation.ko: 당신을 안전한 곳에 며칠간 가둬 둔 다음

translation.en: But truthfully... I have to thank you.
It was your investigation that made me realize she wasn't a murderer at all...
translation.ko: 당신의 수사 덕분에 그 여자가 살인자가 아니란 걸 알았거든요

translation.en: and a culmination of my own research.
I'm developing the technology she'll use one day.
translation.ko: 전 그녀가 언젠가 쓸 기술을 개발하는 중이에요

translation.en: Time travel is complicated. Hard for even me to wrap my head around.
translation.ko: 시간 여행은 복잡한 거예요 저조차도 이해하기 힘들어요

translation.en: To stop something much, much worse.
Imagine you could erase the American Civil War.
translation.ko: 남북전쟁을 막을 수 있다고 상상해 보세요

translation.en: Robert E. Lee? Lincoln? All the Confederate and Union leaders?
translation.ko: 로버트 리, 링컨? 남북의 모든 지도자를요?

translation.en: But that might not be enough to erase an idea.
Maybe we have to kill the people who made them who they are,
who gave them their moral and political beliefs.
translation.ko: 그들의 도덕적, 정치적 신념을 심어 준 사람들을요

translation.en: How far back would you have to go to snuff out the spark that lit the fuse?
translation.ko: 불행의 싹을 잘라내려면 어디까지 가야 할까요?

translation.en: But if you eliminated the right combination of people, one by one,
until you got to the exact start of it, until you got to the one that undoes it all...
translation.ko: 그래서 모든 걸 시작한 사람까지 제거한다면

translation.en: And I won't let you stop her.
translation.ko: 당신이 그걸 막게 둘 순 없어요

translation.en: We can't feel it's pull, but we know it's always there.
translation.ko: 비록 그 힘을 느끼진 못해도 그 존재를 우린 알고 있죠
모든 게 그 영향 아래 있어요

translation.en: You know, the moon is responsible for conditions that allow life on Earth.
translation.ko: 달 덕분에 지구에 생명이 존재할 수 있다는 거 아세요?

translation.en: Well, now, it's responsible for us being able to save ourselves from ourselves.
translation.ko: 이젠 달 덕분에 우릴 우리 자신에게서 구할 거예요

translation.en: You have to let her finish!
You know, when I kill you...
you'll never be able to kill anybody.
Some version of me won't have to chase you.
translation.ko: 또 다른 난 널 쫓지 않아도 될 거고

translation.en: the world as you know it will end in a very short time.
And you have no idea... what's coming.
translation.ko: 당신은 어떤 미래가 다가오고 있는지 몰라요

translation.en: You're not the only one trying to change the past.

translation.ko: 난 평범한 일상으로 돌아갈 수 있어

translation.en: I've known you my entire life.
You're the one who told me to take this job.
translation.ko: 이 일을 맡으라고 한 건 당신이에요

translation.en: And you taught me how to ride a bicycle.
translation.ko: 자전거 타는 법을 가르쳐 준 것도

translation.en: You made me my first ice cream pancakes.
translation.ko: 아이스크림 팬케이크를 처음 만들어 준 것도

translation.en: And you held me on the day I was born.
translation.ko: 제가 태어날 때 절 받아 준 것도요

translation.en: you actually come around to what I'm doing.
But I do kill you. Twenty-seven years ago.
You have to go back and you have to stop me.
Time travel is a one-way trip.
I can't go back until my mission's complete.
translation.ko: 임무를 완수할 때까지 전 돌아갈 수 없어요

translation.en: If it begins with you warning me here in this beach...
translation.ko: 이렇게 해변에서 할아버지에게 경고를 듣는 걸로 시작했다면

translation.en: then it always ends with me dying.
[female automated voice] Welcome to Rao Technology.
an ordinary man parked an ordinary truck
[woman] His attack was just the first.
[woman] Eleven thousand people died the first morning.
Millions more in the Civil War that followed.
[woman] It made monsters out of men.
Until even the ordinary were broken...
The voice that gave birth to a movement...
...turned a small crack into a great divide.
translation.ko: 작은 갈라짐을 커다란 균열로 변화시켰어요 "백인 동지들이여"

translation.en: It drowned out the best of us.
So we found a way to silence it.
We found a way to undo the damage.
[woman] I volunteered to untell the story.
translation.ko: 그리고 그 일에 제가 자원했어요 "해롤드 노웍, 작동"

translation.en: [woman] I came back to erase an idea.
Because some thoughts are meant to be buried.
translation.ko: "조지 워싱턴 영원한 국부" 없어져야 할 신념도 있는 법이니까요

translation.en: When the war between us all disappears...
There will be no great tale in your time.
Just an echo of what might have been.
translation.ko: 일어날 수도 있었던 일의 메아리만 남겠죠

translation.en: And it's time to start your next chapter.
You will teach me how to live.
And you will make me who I am.
both of our lives are about to begin.
translation.ko: 우리 둘의 삶이 곧 시작될 거거든요
